title: List of all Android swipe  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android swipe  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: SwipeBackLayout
repoList.description: An Android library that help you to build app with swipe back gesture.

repoList.name: Android-SwipeToDismiss
repoList.description: Android swipe-to-dismiss mini-library and sample code

repoList.name: SwipeBack
repoList.description: SwipeBack is an android library that can finish a activity by using gesture.

repoList.name: SwipeBackLayout
repoList.description: SwipeBack is an android library that can finish a activity by using gesture.

repoList.name: android-advancedrecyclerview
repoList.description: RecyclerView extension library which provides advanced features. (ex. Google's Inbox app like swiping, Play Music app like drag and drop sorting)

repoList.name: cardslider-android
repoList.description: :octocat: 🃏 Cardslider is a material design UI controller that allows you to swipe through cards with pictures and accompanying descriptions.

repoList.name: Swipecards
repoList.description: A Tinder-like Android library to create the swipe cards effect. You can swipe left or right to like or dislike the content.

repoList.name: SwipeableCard
repoList.description: A simple implementation of swipe card like StreetView

repoList.name: LiquidSwipe
repoList.description: Android LiquidSwipe Library

repoList.name: SimpleFingerGestures_Android_Library
repoList.description: Android Library to implement simple touch/tap/swipe gestures
